name: @maponit/ais2geojson
description: Enable the ais2geojson command line as an AWS Lambda layer - packaged using the serverless framework.
author: Kris Gholson <kris@maponit.com>

scripts.build:layer: make && mkdir -p layer/bin && mv ais2geojson layer/bin
scripts.test1: sls invoke -f ais2geojson --stage prod --region us-east-2 --namespace maponit --log --path test/aismsg1.json
scripts.test2: sls invoke -f ais2geojson --stage prod --region us-east-2 --namespace maponit --log --path test/badmsg.json
